question:
A friend you met last year has invited you to visit him /her in his/her country.you have never been there before and you need some inform before you leave.
Write a letter to the friend . In the letter :
Request advise about the gift for his or her family ask about activities and clothing in his/her country
Find out about the food
text: Thank you for your invitation. It is really a really generous offer and thank you for your generosity. I will love to visit you in Houston Texas. I must say that I  am really excited about this trip and the reason is because I have never been to the United States.

I thought it will be a good idea to get your husband and the kids something really nice when coming and I will like you to advise me on the type of gift they will like.Secondly,can you tell me about the kind various leisure activities you have around you? because I will also like to visit exciting places.

I would like you to tell me about clothing in your area too. I heard their are a lot of trendy clothes stores in Texas and that they  sell mostly Italian designs over there. How true is that. Finally, what’s the food like? Considering the fact that I have never been to that part of the world I will like to know if I can get African dishes such as, Amala, Eba to mention but a few.
I really can’t wait to tour the city with you.

error_list.error_des: It appears that the conjunction because is the wrong word choice after reason is. Consider changing it to that or rewriting the sentence.
It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
The word their may be used incorrectly. Review the following notes to determine the appropriate usage for your context.
Consider using a question mark to signify that this sentence is a question.
It appears that the comma after such as is unnecessary. Consider removing it.
